message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $60 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $75? I think that's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with $70, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $78? I think that's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $78. I was thinking more along the lines of $72. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $72. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $76? That's the best I can do.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $74. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
Hi Bob, I understand you're willing to meet at $74, but I'm still not getting the price I want. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $77? That's the best I can do.
